meanings.definition: Admired or worshipped as an idol.
meanings.sent1: The idolized singer had fans who adored her every move.
meanings.sent2: She felt special being idolized by so many people.
meanings.sent3: The idolized cat thought it ruled the house with its cuteness.
meanings.sent4: The idolized mountain stood majestically against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The idolized hero's bravery inspired everyone around him.

meanings.definition: Regarded with great admiration or devotion.
meanings.sent1: The idolized movie star was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent2: He was idolized for his kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent3: The idolized cupcake was devoured in seconds by the hungry kids.
meanings.sent4: The idolized sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The idolized teacher's wisdom touched the hearts of all her students.
